Los valores de `client_id`, `grant_type` y `client_secret` son preestablecidos y deben usarse tal cual vienen en esta documentación."

import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";
import DiscriminatorTabs from "@theme/DiscriminatorTabs";
import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import SecuritySchemes from "@theme/ApiExplorer/SecuritySchemes";
import MimeTabs from "@theme/MimeTabs";
import ParamsItem from "@theme/ParamsItem";
import ResponseSamples from "@theme/ResponseSamples";
import SchemaItem from "@theme/SchemaItem";
import SchemaTabs from "@theme/SchemaTabs";
import Markdown from "@theme/Markdown";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Autenticación"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/token"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Antes de realizar cualquier operación, es necesario obtener un token de acceso proporcionando tus credenciales (`username` y `password`), que son tu correo electrónico y contraseña con los que ingresas a [t1envios.com](https://t1envios.com). 

Los valores de `client_id`, `grant_type` y `client_secret` son preestablecidos y deben usarse tal cual vienen en esta documentación.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<MimeTabs
  className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}
>
  <TabItem
    label={"application/x-www-form-urlencoded"}
    value={"application/x-www-form-urlencoded-schema"}
  >
    <details
      style={{}}
      className={"openapi-markdown__details mime"}
      data-collapsed={false}
      open={true}
    >
      <summary
        style={{}}
        className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-mime"}
      >
        <h3
          className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-body"}
        >
          Body
        </h3><strong
          className={"openapi-schema__required"}
        >
          required
        </strong>
      </summary><div
        style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        
      </div><ul
        style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
      >
        <SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"grant_type"}
          required={true}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"description":"password","type":"string","examples":"password"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"client_id"}
          required={true}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"description":"t1envios","type":"string","examples":"t1envios"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"username"}
          required={true}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"description":"Correo con que se registro en la pagina","type":"string","examples":"correopruebamonadic@gmail.com"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"password"}
          required={true}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"description":"Contraseña que registro en la pagina","type":"string","examples":"Monadic#2020"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
          collapsible={false}
          name={"client_secret"}
          required={true}
          schemaName={"string"}
          qualifierMessage={undefined}
          schema={{"description":"d1d661be-8487-4660-bc19-540dbb12fb05","type":"string","examples":"d1d661be-8487-4660-bc19-540dbb12fb05"}}
        >
          
        </SchemaItem>
      </ul>
    </details>
  </TabItem>
</MimeTabs><div>

      label={undefined}
      id={undefined}
    >
      <TabItem
        label={"200"}
        value={"200"}
      >
        <div>
          
          
          OK
          
          
        </div><div>
          <MimeTabs
            className={"openapi-tabs__mime"}
            schemaType={"response"}
          >
            <TabItem
              label={"application/json"}
              value={"application/json"}
            >
              <SchemaTabs
                className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}
              >
                <TabItem
                  label={"Schema"}
                  value={"Schema"}
                >
                  <details
                    style={{}}
                    className={"openapi-markdown__details response"}
                    data-collapsed={false}
                    open={true}
                  >
                    <summary
                      style={{}}
                      className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}
                    >
                      <strong>
                        Schema
                      </strong>
                    </summary><div
                      style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}
                    >
                      
                    </div><ul
                      style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}
                    >
                      <SchemaItem
                        collapsible={false}
                        name={"access_token"}
                        required={false}
                        schemaName={"string"}
                        qualifierMessage={undefined}
                        schema={{"type":"string","description":"Contiene el JWT Token de acceso"}}
                      >
                        
                      </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                        collapsible={false}
                        name={"expires_in"}
                        required={false}
                        schemaName={"integer"}
                        qualifierMessage={undefined}
                        schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Tiempo de vida en segundos del access_token.","contentEncoding":"int32"}}
                      >
                        
                      </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                        collapsible={false}
                        name={"refresh_expires_in"}
                        required={false}
                        schemaName={"integer"}
                        qualifierMessage={undefined}
                        schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Tiempo de vida en segundos del token de actualización","contentEncoding":"int32"}}
                      >
                        
                      </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                        collapsible={false}
                        name={"refresh_token"}
                        required={false}
                        schemaName={"string"}
                        qualifierMessage={undefined}
                        schema={{"type":"string","description":"El token de actualización, que se puede usar para obtener nuevos tokens de acceso utilizando la misma concesión de autorización"}}
                      >
                        
                      </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                        collapsible={false}
                        name={"token_type"}
                        required={false}
                        schemaName={"string"}
                        qualifierMessage={undefined}
                        schema={{"type":"string","description":"Tipo de token “bearer”"}}
                      >
                        
                      </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                        collapsible={false}
                        name={"not-before-policy"}
                        required={false}
                        schemaName={"integer"}
                        qualifierMessage={undefined}
                        schema={{"type":"integer","description":"Políticas de revocación no antes por dominio, aplicación y usuario","contentEncoding":"int32"}}
                      >
                        
                      </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                        collapsible={false}
                        name={"session_state"}
                        required={false}
                        schemaName={"string"}
                        qualifierMessage={undefined}
                        schema={{"type":"string","description":"String que representa el estado de inicio de sesión del usuario"}}
                      >
                        
                      </SchemaItem><SchemaItem
                        collapsible={false}
                        name={"scope"}
                        required={false}
                        schemaName={"string"}
                        qualifierMessage={undefined}
                        schema={{"type":"string","description":"scopes otorgados"}}
                      >
                        
                      </SchemaItem>
                    </ul>
                  </details>
                </TabItem><TabItem
                  label={"Example (from schema)"}
                  value={"Example (from schema)"}
                >
                  <ResponseSamples
                    responseExample={"{\n  \"access_token\": \"string\",\n  \"expires_in\": 0,\n  \"refresh_expires_in\": 0,\n  \"refresh_token\": \"string\",\n  \"token_type\": \"string\",\n  \"not-before-policy\": 0,\n  \"session_state\": \"string\",\n  \"scope\": \"string\"\n}"}
                    language={"json"}
                  >
                    
                  </ResponseSamples>
